content: hook into same st yo draw through 1 loop 5 loops on hook yo draw through 2 loops 4 loops on hook 4 yo insert hook into same st yo draw through 1 loop 6 loops on hook yo draw through 2 loops 5 loops on hook 5 yo insert hook into same st yo draw through 1 loop 7 loops on hook yo draw through 2 loops 6 loops on hook 6 yo draw through all 6 loops invisible finish 1 slip_stitch into the next stitch 2 cut the yarn and pull through the last stitch 3 thread the tail onto a tapestry needle skip the next st and insert needle from front to back under both loops of the next st 4 next insert the needle through the back loop of the slip_stitch and the back loop of stitch underneath 5 pull yarn through to complete the invisible finish copyright © 2024 tsui-sie baker-wong - @tsuisie wong 4 head in red yarn round 1 magic_ring 6sc 6 round 2 increase x6 12 round 3 single_crochet increase x6 18 round 4 single_crochet increase single_crochet x6 24 round 5 3sc increase x6 30 round 6 2sc increase 2sc x6 36 round 7-10 36sc for 4 rnds 36 round 11 5sc increase x6 42 round 12 42sc 42 round 13 5sc decrease x6 36 round 14 decrease x18 18 insert safety eyes between rnds8+9 approximately 7 sts apart stuff the head firmly and continue to stuff for remaining rounds round 15 single_crochet decrease x6 12 round 16 decrease x6 6 fasten_off by cutting off approx 10cm 4 inches of yarn tail with the tapestry needle thread the tail through the front loops of the 6 sts and pull to close weave in the tail snout - top in red yarn note the first 2 steps of this part are worked in row then worked in rounds thereafter row 1 magic_ring 6sc ch1 and turn pull magic_ring tight 6 row 2 single_crochet increase x3 ch1 this ch1 does not count as a st 9 copyright © 2024 tsui-sie baker-wong - @tsuisie wong 5 work the following steps in continuous rounds round 3 work 3sc along the straight edge* blo 2sc bobble st 3sc bobble st 2sc 12 round 4 blo 3sc 9sc 12 round 5-6 12sc for 2 rnds 12 *straight edge stuff the snout top firmly fasten_off with invisible finish and leave a long tail for sewing copyright © 2024 tsui-sie baker-wong - @tsuisie wong 6 sew the snout top between rnds7+8 and rnds10+11 of the head in between the eyes snout - bottom in red yarn note leave the snout bottom unstuffed begin with a long tail this will be used to sew the opening gap created by round 1 round 1 ch8 slip_stitch into the first st does not count as a st 8 round 2-3 8sc for 2 rnds 8 fasten_off with invisible finish and leave a long tail for sewing to sew up the opening gap flatten
